Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Let me analyze the log case by case: Case C001: 1. Initiate Request - Start of process 2. Verify Documents - First verification (identity documents) 3. Call Customer - Verification incomplete, calling to request missing docs 4. Submit Additional - Customer uploads ID scan 5. Verify Documents - Second verification (re-checks after ID scan provided) 6. Approve Request - Final approval

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Case C002: 1. Initiate Request - Start 2. Verify Documents - Identity verification 3. Call Customer - Outbound call to clarify account discrepancy 4. Adjust Account - Internal adjustment 5. Call Customer - Follow-up call to confirm adjustments 6. Approve Request - Final approval Case C003: similar listing

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Now, identifying recurring activities per case: C001: Verify Documents appears twice: First time: Initial verification (incomplete) Second time: Re-verification after additional docs submitted C002: Call Customer appears twice: First time: Outbound call to clarify discrepancy Second time: Follow-up call to confirm adjustments C003: Verify Documents appears twice

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So across all cases, the activities that recur within individual cases are: 1. Verify Documents (in C001, C003) 2. Call Customer (in C002)

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Now I need to rename them based on context: For Verify Documents: C001 first: Initial Document Verification C001 second: Re-verify Documents For Call Customer in C002: Call Customer - Clarify Discrepancy and Call Customer - Confirm Adjustments

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Context clues: Position in sequence (before or after adjustment/additional docs) Context description Resource patterns like BranchOfficer vs BackOfficeAgent

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: Wait, if Im renaming for consistency across the log, I should give C001 and C003 call instances descriptive names too, but the prompt specifically asks about activities that appear multiple times within a single case

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Let me re-read: Identify activities that appear multiple times within the same case and interpret how their meaning changes depending on their position in the process or the associated context. So focus on recurring ones

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Revised Activity Names: C001: Initial Document Verification, Re-verify Documents (Post-Submission) C002: Call Customer - Clarify Discrepancy, Call Customer - Confirm Adjustments C003: Initial Physical Document Verification, Re-verify Documents (Post-Correction) Justification based on sequence and context
